Journal.Title: Nephrology nursing journal : journal of the American Nephrology Nurses' Association

Article.ArticleTitle: Assessing the Impact of Intra-Dialytic Exercise Regimen on Depression.

AbstractText: Depression is a common mental health concern among patients with chronic kidney disease. This population has a higher prevalence of hospitalization than those without depression. Exercising during dialysis, specifically intra dialytic pedal cycling, as an intervention can improve patients' overall well-being and promote a better quality of life both mentally and physically.
